channel.title: Android on Md. Jehadul Karim (Sabit)
channel.description: Recent content in Android on Md. Jehadul Karim (Sabit)

item.title: Share A BIT
item.description: What is Share A BIT Share A BIT is a cross platform file sharing app. It is written in Java with JavaFX. So, if an operating system can run Java (which all major Operating System does), you can use Share A BIT in it. Moreover, Share A BIT has an Android Client, which makes it way easier to share file to your phone from you pc and vice-verca wirelessly. The Android app can also be used to share files betweeen two android phones.

item.title: Corona Update
item.description: An Android App which shows current situation of corona all over the world. It shows, Total Number of Infected People Total Number of Recovered People Total number of Active cases Total number of Death To use the app, you have to be conncted to the Internet. The app gets data from the Internet. To avoid unneccesary complexity, I didn’t add an other facilities like auto refresh. You can refresh manually by closing and opening the app again.
